name: photosynthesize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a plant) to use carbon dioxide from the air, water from the ground, and energy from the light of the sun to produce food for itself and oxygen: The grasses need light to photosynthesize. Submerged rice plants need to be able to photosynthesize under water. Tall blades of grass have more surface area exposed to the sun, enabling them to photosynthesize more sugars and starches for greater root growth. See
photosynthesis
More examplesFewer examplesThe plants need their leaves to photosynthesize.Because of a recent drought, local trees have prematurely begun to photosynthesize.There is a range of ways that plants photosynthesize.
